from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
spark = SparkSession.builder.getOrCreate()
from notebookutils import mssparkutils
import json
import pandas as pd
import csv
from datetime import date

### mount the data lake storage in Synapse to the Synapse File Mount API
jobId = mssparkutils.env.getJobId()
storage_acc_name = spark.sparkContext.environment.get('dataLakeAccountName', 'get')
mount_storage(path="abfss://odw-raw@"+storage_acc_name+".dfs.core.windows.net/IMS/API-Data/", mount_point='/ims_items')

today = date.today()
todaysdate = today.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")

def json_to_csv(source):
    attributesList=[]
    with open(f"/synfs/{jobId}/ims_items/{source}.json", "r",encoding='utf-8') as inputfile:
        ims_dict = json.load(inputfile)
        for items in ims_dict["data"]:
            dict = items['attributes']
            attributesList.append(dict)
    sparkDF = spark.createDataFrame(attributesList)

    output_folder_path = f"abfss://odw-raw@{storage_acc_name}.dfs.core.windows.net/IMS/New/{todaysdate}/{source}"
    sparkDF.repartition(1).write.mode('overwrite').option("header",True).csv(output_folder_path)

    output_files = mssparkutils.fs.ls(output_folder_path)
    output_files = [f for f in output_files if f.name.endswith('.csv')]

    if len(output_files) > 0:
        output_file = output_files[0]
        mssparkutils.fs.mv(output_file.path, output_folder_path + '.csv', True)
        mssparkutils.fs.rm(output_folder_path, True)

json_to_csv("IMS_bdc_attribute")
json_to_csv("IMS_bdc_entity")
json_to_csv("IMS_data_flow")
json_to_csv("IMS_data_sharing")
json_to_csv("IMS_dpia")
json_to_csv("IMS_information_assets")
json_to_csv("IMS_integration")
json_to_csv("IMS_master_data_map")
json_to_csv("IMS_ropa")
